title: Welcome to GymBud
subtitle: Let's set up your personalized training plan

biometrics.title: Tell us about you
biometrics.explain: We use your basic info to personalize your training and track your progress more accurately over time.

goals.title: Your goal & routine
goals.explain: Your goals shape your program. The coach will adjust its style to motivate you in the way that feels right for your journey.
goals.equipment_basic: Select what you have at home
goals.equipment_explain: We adapt your workouts to the equipment you actually have, so you never see exercises you can't do.
goals.schedule_explain: Your schedule helps us design a plan that fits your week instead of fighting against it.
goals.tone_auto: We'll set your coach tone based on your goal.

profile.title: Training profile
profile.explain: Knowing about injuries or limitations keeps your workouts safe and effective.
profile.no_constraints: No injuries or constraints? Great! You can skip this section.

review.title: Review & create your plan
review.explain: Your first session sets your starting point. We'll use it to build a plan that grows with you.
review.done: Let's start with your baseline session.

completion.title: Setup Complete!
completion.message: Your personalized training plan is ready
